topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554942c96368722b86d10300#post_554942c96368722b86d10300
[bq="ParagonCommander"]I'm starting to wonder whether I have anger issues regarding games.
If I lose due to my error or lose fairly, then I'm good.
If I lose and it's lag or something outside of my control, then I'm irritated.
If I lose due to cheap or annoying play, _I'm fucking enraged._

I get annoyed as fuck at Smash when I lose and Mortal Kombat X's multiplayer is making me hate the entire game as a whole, which isn't fair.
Oh, and when someone says "git gud", that doesn't make you funny or clever.
*_It makes you a +cunt.+_*[/bq]
You know what's funny?
I rarely rage on video games.
The only times I rage are when I get spawn killed, when my team leaves me against a full enemy team, and stuffs like that.
